name: Chain of Blocks
description:
In Chain of Blocks, You must hack into the blocks of the blockchain to get points! however as time progresses, each block will become harder to hack...

MADE FOR BITPOIN

finished in 2 days 💪

How to Play:

  1. Tap the screen, click, or press "enter" to select a coin
  2. Tap the screen, click, or press "enter to hack, if the current coin matches the coin you selected (next to the score), then you get 1 point
  3. if it doesn't match then you lose, Tap the screen, click, or press "enter" to retry
